channel.title: Server problem
channel.description: im using the fr33sc4p3 source and when i log in itsays fr33sc4p3 above owner thing how i change to say 3vilsc4p3???, also the fr33sc4p3 is multi colored,the first letter is white and last is white,plz help me,wat i do??[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 08:36:27 PM[/size][hr]anyone know how to help????[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 08:39:13 PM[/size][hr]the fr33sc4p3 letter r like @whi@,@yel@ and others so idk wat to do :) plzz help me[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 08:43:40 PM[/size][hr]can someone help me,im stuck!!! plzz post if ucan help!!!! :)[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 08:53:45 PM[/size][hr]ppl plzz post i have to go sooon so post if u know anything!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :) Help Me before i go and will be mad for noone posting!!!

item.title: Server problem
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

client > edit > replace > first box = @red@~@whi@F@red@r@gre@3@cya@3@whi@s@red@c@gre@4@cya@p@whi@3@red@~

second box = 3vilSc4p3 > replace all

Read full topic

item.title: Server problem
item.dc:creator: @exo23 exo23
item.description:
@exo23 wrote:

look for this in client.java look for “@red@~@whi@F@red@r@gre@3@cya@3@whi@s@red@c@gre@4@cya@p@whi@3@red@~” and change that to wat u want up there in getead of Fr33dc4p3
